Levels.s__9: Presentation of payoff of both options
Levels.s_10: Presentation of the probablity of both options
Levels.s_20: Beginig of the waiting time for the result

good.Description: trials correctly presented on the screen {0,1}

a.Description: ambiguity area as a proportion of the bar [0 0.8]

bias.Description: Bias in the actual division of the option behind the mask: 0 indicates the left extreme, 0.5 in the middle of the mask, and 1 on the right extreme.

p.Description: Actual probability [0 1] of the left option, the right option takes the value of (1-p).

pv.Description: Visible probability [0 1] of the left option, that is, witho take into the accout the hidden area (a). [ pv*(1-a) + (1-pv)*(1-a) + a = 1 ] and  [pv*(1-a) + (bias)*a = p ]. The right option takes the value of (1-pv).
